title: Productive Contracts?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Spencer Hall debate if the Cardinals fixed things by removing the independent study clause from Kyler Murray’s contract and if they view the weight clause as a productive part of Zion’s new contract.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Is The Language In Zion And Kyler's Contracts An Issue?
